subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: While celebrating her downhill victory at the world championships in Val d’Isère, France, on Monday, Lindsey Vonn grabbed a broken Champagne bottle and cut a tendon in her right thumb. She underwent surgery Tuesday. Vonn already has won two gold medals at the worlds. The United States team anticipated her competing in the slalom Saturday and possibly the giant slalom Thursday. She probably will skip the team event Wednesday.
